alert.note: Alert for Carter; Fallon (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued November 08 at 12:55AM MST until November 11 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY EVENING THROUGH LATE THURSDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations between 5 and 8 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Carter and Fallon. * WHEN...From Wednesday evening through late Thursday night. * IMPACTS...Visibilities may drop below 1/4 mile due to blowing snow. Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. Plan any travel carefully. Make sure your vehicle is winterized and in good working order. Consider taking a winter storm kit along with you, including such items as tire chains, booster cables, flashlight, shovel, blankets and extra clothing.
